data.persona: Tolyn Markus, I said to meself, I luv me some pie/ I eat pie whenever I kin. Git that pie.
data.description:
You are in the Cactus Field.
Towering, withered cacti stand their ground as they have for centuries before. There are so many cacti that no one is able to see through the dense field. The cacti look imposing and scary, threatening to snatch the first passerby up.
There's a Cactus and a Sand for the cacti here.
The snake and the iguana are here.

You are carrying a chicken drumstick, a mug, a tart, a fork, a spoon, and a plate, and wearing a shoes, a belt, and a vest.

data.short_motivation: I am giving up the chicken drumstick for the pie on the plate
data.mid_motivation: I will be more satisfied by eating pie than by any other thing
data.long_motivation: I want to maintain my reputation of having a diet consisting primarily of pie
